name: Canadian Mounted Police Horse Training: The Agility Test Racing Course - Free
name_original: Canadian Mounted Police Horse Training: The Agility Test Racing Course - Free
description:
HORSE TRAINING!

Control Canadian Mounted Horse Police Officer while avoiding cardboard targets. Collect coins on your way to unlock 5 new police officers and horses.

Join today for POLICE HORSE training!

We love to hear your feedback. Please send us your comment on support@meilleursjeuxmobiles.com
